trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Disponibiliza dados para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting"> </xref> eventos do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs class is used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnSelecting%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: A classe de ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs é utilizada no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnSelecting%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnSelecting%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because it is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs> class, the ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs class provides access to input parameters for validation and manipulation through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs.InputParameters%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Porque deriva do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs>classe, a classe de ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs fornece acesso aos parâmetros de validação e manipular através de entrada a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs.InputParameters%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs.InputParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs class also provides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs.ExecutingSelectCount%2A> property, which is used to check whether the currently executing data retrieval operation is retrieving a row count, in addition to the data.
trans-unit.target: A classe de ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs também fornece a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs.ExecutingSelectCount%2A>propriedade, o que é utilizada para verificar se a operação de obtenção de dados atualmente em execução está a obter um número de linhas, além dos dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs.ExecutingSelectCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is important because when data source paging is enabled, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting> event is raised twice.
trans-unit.target: Isto é importante porque quando a paginação da origem de dados estiver ativada, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>o evento é gerado duas vezes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs.ExecutingSelectCount%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs.ExecutingSelectCount%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs.ExecutingSelectCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control exposes many events that you can handle to work with the underlying business object at various times in its life cycle.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>controlo expõe muitos eventos que pode processar para trabalhar com o objecto de negócio subjacentes a horas variadas no respetivo ciclo de vida.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the events and associated <xref:System.EventArgs> classes and event handler delegates.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte lista os eventos e associados <xref:System.EventArgs>classes e os delegados do processador de eventos.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Event|`EventArgs`|`EventHandler`| |-----------|-----------------|--------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>.
trans-unit.target: | Evento | `EventArgs`|`EventHandler`| |-----------|-----------------|--------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>

trans-unit.source: Occurs immediately before the business object is instantiated.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated>.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre imediatamente antes de é instanciado o objecto de negócio. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs immediately after the business object is instantiated.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre imediatamente depois de é instanciado o objecto de negócio. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the data is retrieved.|ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting>.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre antes dos dados são obtidos. | ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Occur before an insert, update, or delete operation is performed.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected>.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre antes de uma insert, update ou de operação de eliminação é efetuada. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the data is retrieved.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted>.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre depois dos dados são obtidos. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occur after the insert, update, or delete operation is completed.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>.
trans-unit.target: Ocorrer após a inserção, atualização ou eliminação operação for concluída. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs before a business object is destroyed.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventHandler>|
trans-unit.target: Ocorre antes de um objecto de negócio é destruído. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventHandler>|</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The `inputParameters` parameter is an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> collection of name/value pairs that match those in the method signature and are passed by reference.
trans-unit.target: O `inputParameters` parâmetro é uma <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>coleção de pares nome/valor que correspondem da assinatura do método e são transmitidos por referência.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"> </xref> objetos.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> that specifies which additional data-related operations the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> should perform on a results set, such as sorting the data or returning a specific subset of data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref> que especifica as operações relacionadas com a dados adicionais a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref> deve efetuar-se num conjunto de resultados, tais como os dados a ordenação ou devolver um subconjunto específico de dados.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> is retrieving the number of rows of data, in addition to the data itself; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para indicar o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref> está a obter o número de linhas de dados, para além dos dados propriamente ditos; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Provides a mechanism that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> object can use to request data-related operations when data is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um mecanismo que a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref> objeto pode utilizar para pedir operações relacionadas com a dados quando os dados são obtidos.

trans-unit.source: Data-bound controls use the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> class to request that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> object perform additional data-related operations on a results set, such as sorting the data or returning a specific subset of data.
trans-unit.target: Utilizam controlos vinculados a dados a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>classe para pedir que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>objeto executar operações relacionadas com a dados adicionais num conjunto de resultados, tais como os dados a ordenação ou devolver um subconjunto específico de dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: These data-related operations are enumerated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Estas operações relacionadas com a dados são enumeradas pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities>enumeração.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities>

trans-unit.source: The Arguments property is read-only, so you can examine, but not change, the arguments that are passed by the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de argumentos é só de leitura, pelo que pode examinar, mas não alterar, os argumentos que são transferidos pelo controlo vinculado a dados.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> that specifies which additional data-related operations the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> should perform on a results set.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref> que especifica as operações relacionadas com a dados adicionais a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref> deve executar um conjunto de resultados.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> is retrieving a row count during a data retrieval operation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref> está a obter um número de linhas durante uma operação de obtenção de dados.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> object is performing data retrieval and data source paging is enabled, the data retrieval method is called twice: - Once to retrieve the set of data.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>objeto está a efetuar a obtenção de dados e paginação da origem de dados estiver ativada, o método de obtenção de dados é chamado duas vezes:-uma vez para obter o conjunto de dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: - Once to retrieve a total row count.
trans-unit.target: -Uma vez para obter uma contagem de total de linhas.

trans-unit.source: This raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting> event twice.
trans-unit.target: Isto gera o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>evento duas vezes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>

trans-unit.source: For code that handles the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting> event, it might be important to determine the nature of the event (retrieving data or retrieving row count) so that any additional work that is performed by the handler is not unnecessarily duplicated for every data retrieval operation that is performed.
trans-unit.target: Para o código que processa o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>eventos, pode ser importante determinar a natureza do evento (obter dados ou ao obter número de linhas) para que o trabalho adicional que é efetuado pelo processador não for duplicado, desnecessariamente, para cada operação de obtenção de dados que é executada.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if data source paging is enabled and the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> is retrieving a row count; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, se estiver ativada a paginação da origem de dados e o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref> está a obter um número de linhas; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
